title: SENRI with Afri-inc
detail: I am supporting the start up comparny, which is Afri-inc, to develop its own Android Application. The firm is located in Africa and the App helps the customers as shering the sales and inventory infomation.

title: FUKAI DENTAL CLINIC
detail: I created a website for Fukai Dental Clinic in Japan, powered by WORDPRESS. The website is quite simple because any contents are the same to Kawakami Dental Clinic's one, which I created before. It can still give patients enough infomation.
